analysis.description:
TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/31/0xf8459ead98b6f28cb90008a985fb82bf2fd16e60.sol#651-662) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf8459ead98b6f28cb90008a985fb82bf2fd16e60.sol#659-660)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/31/0xf8459ead98b6f28cb90008a985fb82bf2fd16e60.sol#688-704) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= _releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf8459ead98b6f28cb90008a985fb82bf2fd16e60.sol#693-696)
